meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>expand brackets for a power of a product</term>. If you see an expression like <inline-math/> you can turn this into <inline-math/> which subsequently becomes <inline-math/>. This includes <skill-link>simplifying products of numbers</skill-link> into a single number. It may also include <skill-link>rewriting negative powers</skill-link> like turning <inline-math/> into <inline-math/>.</par>
